General.Name: BoomBit S.A
General.Description: BoomBit S.A. develops and publishes computer games. It has operations in North and South America, Europe, Asia, Africa, Australia, and Oceania. The company was formerly known as AIDEM MEDIA SPÓLKA Z OGRANICZONA ODPOWIEDZIALNOSCIA. BoomBit S.A. was founded in 2010 and is based in Gdansk, Poland.
